md:
giải nghĩa từ "leagues" sang tiếng việt; đưa ra nghĩa tiếng việt theo từ loại và đưa ra câu ví dụ, các từ liên quan.

* League (noun) - Liên đoàn
	+ Meaning: A group of people, teams, or countries that are joined together for a particular purpose or activity.
	+ Example: The European League of Nations was established to promote peace and stability in the region.
	+ Related words: alliance, association, federation, union

* League (verb) - Liên kết
	+ Meaning: To join or unite with others in a common purpose or activity.
	+ Example: The two companies decided to league together to form a joint venture.
	+ Related words: ally, associate, combine, unite

* League (noun) - Đơn vị đo lường
	+ Meaning: A unit of measurement, especially an old unit of distance equal to about 3 miles.
	+ Example: The village was a league away from the nearest town.
	+ Related words: mile, kilometer, yard, meter
html:
giải nghĩa từ "leagues" sang tiếng việt; đưa ra nghĩa tiếng việt theo từ loại và đưa ra câu ví dụ, các từ liên quan.

  • League (noun) - Liên đoàn

    • Meaning: A group of people, teams, or countries that are joined together for a particular purpose or activity.
    • Example: The European League of Nations was established to promote peace and stability in the region.
    • Related words: alliance, association, federation, union

  • League (verb) - Liên kết

    • Meaning: To join or unite with others in a common purpose or activity.
    • Example: The two companies decided to league together to form a joint venture.
    • Related words: ally, associate, combine, unite

  • League (noun) - Đơn vị đo lường

    • Meaning: A unit of measurement, especially an old unit of distance equal to about 3 miles.
    • Example: The village was a league away from the nearest town.
    • Related words: mile, kilometer, yard, meter
